content.text: Yuki was the little ranch girl who lived on a remote island on a ranch where the giants celebrated. She was responsible for starting the duel between Dorry and Brogy.
Yuki has short brown hair. She wears a red top underneath yellow overalls.
Yuki is very curious, asking Dorry and Brogy which Sea King they caught was bigger. She is also good spirited, since she was laughing and having fun with the band of giants.
Over 100 years ago, when Dorry and Brogy caught two huge Sea Kings, she bet them to see which was bigger, starting the duel between the two giants. It is unknown what happened to Yuki after that.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 15 Chapter 129 and Episode 78, Yuki makes her debut.
↑  Vivre Card - One Piece Visual Dictionary, Yuki's birthday is revealed.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File (p. 67).
